thread.title: Great staff, great location, great room
thread.title_full: Great staff, great location, great room - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kjartan T
title: Great staff, great location, great room
text: If you want to be pampered, in a beautiful room with brilliant service, this is the place. We came to London for a night in town and wanted to spoil ourselves without breaking the bank and boy did they deliver. And having on site parking does not hurt. Overall a great experience for a very manageable price.
